location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 18 May and transmitting a letter received by Kaye from W. Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Fort William, dated 23 July 1814, authorizing the expenditure of 500 Rupees to repair the Factory in Bushire.
